response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I propose a special introductory price of $14,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent opportunity to secure this high-quality item at a price point that is still significantly above its cost to me while saving you $1,000 compared to its market value. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 14000}
